Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Ad-hoc reviewer for for Environmental Health Perspective (EHP)
Editorial Review Board Member, Environmental Epigenetics
Ad hoc reviewer for PLOS ONE
Ad hoc reviewer for Environmental Research

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: International Society for Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE) Conference, Basel, Switzerland. Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms in MicroRNA Processing Genes and Susceptibility to the Effects of Black Carbon on Cognition in a Cohort of Older Men. (Oral)

International Society for Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE) Conference, Seattle, WA. Telomere Length Modifies the Effects of Long Term Exposure to Traffic Air Pollution on Cognitive Function of Aging Individuals (Oral).
International Society for Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE) Conference, Rome, Italy. Fine Particulate Matter, Outdoor Temperature and Risk of Metabolic Syndrome. (Oral)
International Society for Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE) Post Conference workshop, Rome, Italy. Epigenomic Data Lab: Hands on Session for Epigenome-Wide DNA Methylation Data Analysis. (Oral)

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Svolgimento del progetto di ricerca su Mitochondriomics, Air Particles and Cognition. Sponsorizzato dall' NIH grant "Molecular and Epigenetic Mitochondriomics of Air Particles, Lead and Cognition." R01ES021733. Principal Investigator: Andrea Baccarelli.

Svolgimento del progetto di ricerca su Epigenetic Measures and All-Cause Mortality. Sponsorizzato dal'NIH grant "Identigying Epigenetic Mechanisms Underlying Age-Related Disease Risk In Charge" U34AG051418. Co-Principal Investigator: Andrea Baccarelli

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Membro della International Society of Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE)

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Insegnamento di "Statistics for Econometrics". PhD School presso Bocconi University, Milano, Italia

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Guest lecturer per Survival Analysis in Epigenome-Wide Associations Studies. Corso in Environmental Epigenetics, Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Boston, USA
Guest lecturer per Epigenome-wide DNA methylation landscape and Cardio-metabolic Dysfunctions. Corso in Environmental Epigenetics, Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Boston, USA
Insegnamento di "Session for Epigenome-Wide DNA Methylation Data Analysis." presso Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health, New York, USA
Insegnamento di "Analysis of Environmental Health Data" a studenti undergraduate. Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health, New York, USA

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: PostDoctoral Research Fellow del Laboratory of Human Environmental Epigenetics, presso Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Boston USA
Leader del Computational Epigenomics Working Group, presso Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Boston USA
PostDoctoral Research Scientist del Laboratory of Precision Environmental Biosciences, presso Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health, New York, USA.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Parte della interdisciplinare PhD School, presso la Bocconi University, Milano Italia
Parte del Laboratory of Human Environmental Epigenetics, presso Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Boston, MA, USA
Leader del Computational Epigenomics Working Group, presso Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Boston, MA, USA
Parte del Laboratory of Precision Environmental Biosciences, presso Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health, New York, NY, USA.
